document.docAuthor: Asenjo, Angélico, Irmler, Ulrich, Klimaszewski, Jan, Chandler, Donald S., Fierros-López, Hugo Eduardo & Vieira, Juliana S.
document.masterDocTitle: Staphylinidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) in Latin America: synopsis, annotated catalog, diversity and distribution

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Staphylinidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) in Latin America: synopsis, annotated catalog, diversity and distribution

bibRefCitation.author: Bernhauer, M.
bibRefCitation.refString: Bernhauer, M. (1903 a) Die Staphyliniden-Tribus Leptochirina nebst analytischen Bestimmungstabellen der Gattungen und Arten. Deutsche Entomologische Zeitschrift, 1903 (1), 113 - 160.

subSubSection.paragraph: 57 species are included in this genus from Latin America.
Central America: Mexico , Guatemala , Belize , Honduras , El Salvador , Nicaragua , Costa Rica , Panama .
South America: Colombia , Venezuela , Guyana , French Guiana , Ecuador , Peru , Bolivia , Brazil , Paraguay , Argentina .

bibRefCitation.refString: Wu, J. & Zhou, H. Z. (2007) Phylogetic analysis and reclassification of the genus Priochirus Sharp (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Osoriinae). Invertebrate Systematics, 21, 73 - 107. https: // doi. org / 10.1071 / IS 06010

subSubSection.paragraph: 1 species is included in this genus from South America.
Characters/Description: Wu & Zhou 2007: 81 (characters, characters in key).
Other regions: Palaearctic, Madagascan, Oriental , Australian, Oceanic.

bibRefCitation.author: Nakane, T. & Sawada, K.
bibRefCitation.refString: Nakane, T. & Sawada, K. (1960) The Coleoptera of Yakushima Island, Staphylinidae. The scientific reports of Kyoto Prefectural University (Natural science and living science), 3 A (2), 121 - 126.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Borolinus bicornis Nakane & Sawada, 1960
11 species are included in this genus from Central and South America.
Key: Bernhauer 1903a: 136 (subgenera and species of the genus); Wu & Zhou 2007: 81 (subgenera of the genus).
Central America: Mexico , Guatemala , Honduras , Belize , Costa Rica , Panama .
